ÈhqKq l< m%foaYhla jYfhka m%ldYhg m;a lsÍu

iyldr flduidßia fj; ,eî we;s n,;, m%ldrj wkqrdOmqr mßmd,k Èia;s%lalfha iyldr m<d;a md,k flduidßia f,i

“1987 wxl 15 ork m%dfoaYSh iNd mkf;a 134 jk j.ka;sfha ^1& jk Wmj.ka;sfhka m%dfoaYSh iNd fj; mejÍ we;s n,;, 
m%ldr" kef.kysr kqjr.ï m<d; m%dfoaYSh iNd n, m%foaYh we;=<; msysáhd jQ o" my; Wmf,aLkfha we;=<;a lr we;s 
is;shfuka yd tA iuÕ úia;r flfrk iSudjka we;=<; msysáhd jQ o" m%foaY ÈhqKq l< m%foaYhla jYfhka m%ldYhg m;a 
lsÍugo" fï fhdackd iïu;h i|yd wkqrdOmqr Èia;%slalfha m<d;a md,k iyldr flduidßiaf.a wkque;sh ,nd .; hq;= 
njg iy tlS m%foaYfha msysáhd jQ ish¿ ksYap, foam,j, iy ksYap, foam, j¾.j, jd¾Isl jákdlï ;lafiare lsÍug;a" 
tfia ;lafiare lrk ,o jd¾Isl jákdlï u; jßmkï kshu lsÍug;a 1989 wxl 12 ork m<d;a iNd ^wkqIdx.sl úêúOdk& 
mkf;a 2 jk j.ka;sh iuÕ lshúh hq;= by; lS m%dfoaYSh iNd mkf;a 134 jk j.ka;sfha ^1& jk Wm j.ka;sh hgf;a W;=re

m%dfoaYSh iNd n, m%foaYfha fldgila ÈhqKq l< m%foaYhla f,i ms<s.ekSu i|yd jQ fhdackdj

nj;a"
